name: Meep (ZebraAtomica)
description:
Here you play as Meep, an unfortunate little guy that has to pass to incredible problems to reach a peacefull new home where others would give the warmth he wants.

This is a Game Jam for Games 4 Good - Lisbon where the theme was "Homelesness", sponsored by CASA. Or idea play as an abstract representation of one of the cases of homeless ocurrences,  refugees from other countries that are desperately in need and longs for a warm welcome. 

GravityI - Programmer

TheJokeLion - Artist

ZebraAtomica - Game Design, Animations
